# Senior Backend Engineer at InnovateTech Solutions

## Company Information
- **Company:** InnovateTech Solutions
- **Location:** San Francisco, CA (Hybrid)
- **Job Type:** Full-time
- **Experience Level:** Senior (5-8 years)
- **Salary Range:** $150,000 - $200,000

## Job Description

InnovateTech Solutions is seeking a Senior Backend Engineer to join our growing engineering team. You will work on building scalable microservices that power our cloud-based data analytics platform serving Fortune 500 companies.

## Responsibilities

- Design and implement scalable backend services using Python and Go
- Build and maintain data pipelines processing terabytes of data daily
- Collaborate with frontend teams to design robust APIs
- Mentor junior engineers and conduct code reviews
- Participate in on-call rotation for production support
- Optimize system performance and reduce infrastructure costs

## Requirements

### Required Skills
- Python
- PostgreSQL
- Docker
- Kubernetes
- AWS
- Redis
- Microservices architecture
- RESTful APIs

### Preferred Skills
- Apache Kafka
- Apache Spark
- Go
- GraphQL
- Terraform
- CI/CD pipelines

### Experience
- **Required Experience:** 5+ years of backend development
- **Required Education:** Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

### Other Requirements
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
- Strong understanding of distributed systems
- Excellent problem-solving skills
- Good communication and teamwork abilities

## Technical Stack

- **Languages:** Python, Go
- **Databases:** PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB
- **Infrastructure:** AWS (EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda), Kubernetes, Docker
- **Data:** Apache Kafka, Apache Spark, Airflow
- **Tools:** Git, Jenkins, Terraform, Datadog

## Company Description

InnovateTech Solutions is a fast-growing SaaS company providing enterprise data analytics solutions. Our platform processes billions of events daily and serves customers across healthcare, finance, and retail industries. We value engineering excellence, work-life balance, and continuous learning.
